text: Abarumwa babu nibaboola mbu: ‘‘koo Mukanakanilanga Nyasaye Omulonji welikulu nende eshialo? Ye abalanganga mbu abaleshele ebionono bienyu, ne abahelesie obwiyangu okhula khubise biarebwaho” Nibaboola mbu; “ Enywe mulisa Abandu shinga efwe, mwenyanga butswa okhukhwikalila nende akabapapa befu balamanga, kho murere akokhuchenyia kali habulafu”
